name: Itchy Dog Flea and Tick Shampoo 300ml – Plant-Based Gentle Dog Shampoo – Flea & Tick Care for Dogs – Cleanses & Freshens Coat – for Sensitive Skin – by C&G Pets
short_description: CLEANSES AND HELPS REMOVE FLEA & TICK DIRT: A natural dog shampoo that gently cleanses the coat and helps wash away dirt, debris, and flea or tick residue. Free from harsh chemicals, making it ideal for routine bathing and coat care.

CALMS AND MOISTURIZES ITCHY, DRY SKIN: Enriched with Dead Sea salt, seaweed, and Dunaliella Salina to help soothe and comfort skin that may be irritated from dryness or environmental factors. The mineral-rich blend supports hydration and a healthy coat appearance.

VET DEVELOPED AND GENTLE FOR REGULAR USE: Formulated with guidance from veterinary dermatology experts to help support skin balance and coat condition. Gentle enough for sensitive or allergy-prone dogs and suitable for weekly use.

NON-TOXIC, NATURALLY DERIVED, AND SAFE: Made with vegan, plant-based ingredients and free from parabens, sulfates, and artificial fragrance. Safe for all breeds and gentle for puppies over 12 weeks when used as directed.

TRUSTED BRITISH BRAND – RESCUE SUPPORTED: Proudly developed by a British family-run brand committed to ethical, effective pet care. Backed by rescue centers and created with a thoughtful blend of science and nature to support skin and coat wellness with integrity.
product_description: Help your dog feel clean, comfortable, and refreshed with C&G Itchy Dog Flea & Tick Shampoo, developed with our patented Dead Sea Complex. This gentle yet effective formula combines sea salt, seaweed, mineral-rich mud, and beneficial Dunaliella Salina extract to deeply cleanse the coat and help wash away dirt, debris, and flea or tick residue. This natural dog shampoo is free from harsh chemicals and designed to support healthy skin and coat condition. Perfect for dogs that experience itching, dryness, or irritation, it helps reduce scratching and leaves the coat soft, shiny, and nourished. How to Use: Shake well before use. Wet your dog’s coat thoroughly, apply the shampoo, and gently massage into the fur, focusing on areas that need extra care. Leave on for 5–10 minutes before rinsing thoroughly and drying. Use 1–2 times per week or as needed as part of your regular grooming routine. Made with non-toxic, plant-based ingredients, this gentle formula is suitable for adult dogs and puppies 12 weeks and older. It offers a natural alternative to harsh chemical washes and supports ongoing coat cleanliness and freshness. Ideal for use alongside your existing dog care routine, this shampoo helps maintain a clean, comfortable coat while caring for sensitive skin. It’s a simple, natural way to support your dog’s well-being and help keep their coat in great condition. Trusted British Brand – Rescue Supported C&G is a proud British, family-run brand backed by rescue centers and dedicated to ethical, effective pet care. Our formulas combine science and nature to give every dog the comfort, confidence, and care they deserve. Try C&G Itchy Dog Flea & Tick Shampoo 300ml today for a naturally clean, refreshed, and happy dog.

name: ADAMS Plus Flea & Tick Shampoo with Precor IGR for Cats, Kittens, Dogs & Puppies Over 12 Weeks of Age, Sensitive Skin Flea Treatment, Kills Adult Fleas, Flea Eggs, Ticks, and Lice, 6 Ounces
short_description: EFFECTIVE FLEA AND TICK TREATMENT: Kills fleas, flea eggs, ticks and lice on contact

SOFT, SHINY AND CLEAN: Rich, creamy formula washes and conditions your pet’s coat, leaving it soft, shiny and easy to manage. Light scent helps your pet smell fresh.; Great for all dogs and cats 12 weeks and older
CONTINUOUS PROTECTION: This shampoo stops the flea life cycle and keeps flea eggs from hatching for 28 days
A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY: ADAMS Plus Flea & Tick Shampoo With Precor IGR is formulated to help with grooming; You only need to use about 4 teaspoons for every 5 lbs of pet’s weight

50 YEARS OF RESULTS: Since 1975, the people who bring you ADAMS have helped owners confidently care for their pets, ensuring they live happy and healthy lives. Complete your flea and tick control system with ADAMS pet, home and yard products
product_description: Get rid of fleas and ticks in one bath with ADAMS Plus Flea & Tick Shampoo with Precor IGR. This shampoo kills fleas, flea eggs, ticks and lice on contact. It also stops new fleas from growing into biting adult fleas for up to 28 days. At the same time, this shampoo helps make your pet’s skin and coat healthy and soft and works to stop tangles, so fur is easy to brush. The lightly scented fragrance leaves them smelling pleasantly fresh. ADAMS Plus Flea & Tick Shampoo With Precor IGR is made to help with grooming, you only need to use about 4 teaspoons for every 5 lbs of pet’s weight. Use it on dogs, cats, puppies and kittens over 12 weeks old. The best protection you can offer your pet is protecting them and the areas where they live and play. Since only 5% of fleas live on your pet, use this shampoo with other ADAMS products to protect your pet, home and yard for complete pest control. Since 1975, the people who bring you ADAMS have helped owners confidently care for their pets, ensuring they live happy and healthy lives.
product_details: Item Package Dimensions L x W x H 6.5 x 1.77 x 1.69 inches
Item Dimensions LxWxH 1.88 x 1.88 x 5.52 inches
Target Audience Keyword Dog; flea; tick; shampoo; dogs; cats; puppies; kittens; natural; igr; lanolin; oatmeal; aloe; pet; anti; kills; eggs, dogs

Directions DO NOT USE ON DOGS OR CATS LESS THAN 12 WEEKS OLD. Wet pet’s coat thoroughly with water, then pump shampoo onto pet and rub shampoo into coat starting with head and working back and down. Use about 1 1/3 tablespoons for each 5 lbs. of pet's weight. Do not apply shampoo around eyes. Continue to work lather in over the whole pet for 3 to 5 minutes (this is an important part of the grooming procedure). Rinse pet with warm water and towel dry. For extremely dirty or scaly animals, the above procedure may be repeated. Repeat every 7 to 10 days (if necessary) for adult flea relief. Flea egg hatch inhibition will last for 28 days.
Warranty Description Satisfaction 100% guaranteed or your money back

name: Zodiac Oatmeal Conditioning Shampoo for Dogs & Puppies 18 ounces, Small
short_description: Kills adult fleas, ticks and lice on contact
Controls flea reinfestation for up to 28 days
Aloe works to re-moisturize, heal, and soothe dry skin
Rich, creamy formula cleans and conditions
Use only on dogs and puppies older than 12 weeks of age
Lightly scented
Active ingredient derived from chrysanthemums
product_description: The Zodiac Oatmeal Conditioning Shampoo for Dogs & Puppies is a concentrated lathering shampoo enriched with oatmeal, coconut extract, lanolin, and aloe. This sensitive skin formula leaves the coat soft, shining, and manageable — and smelling pleasantly fresh. It removes loose dandruff, dirt, and scales and kills fleas, ticks, and lice on contact while preventing flea eggs from hatching for up to 28 days. Lather shampoo into your dog’s coat, starting at the head and working back along the neck, legs, and feet. Continue this process for 3-5 minutes (this is an important part of the grooming procedure). If necessary, repeat every 7-10 days for adult flea relief. Flea egg hatch inhibition will last for 28 days.
product_details: Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 2.2 x 2.2 x 8 inches; 1.13 Pounds
Best Sellers Rank: #26,341 in Pet Supplies ( See Top 100 in Pet Supplies ) #47 in Dog Shampoos Plus Conditioners
Item Package Dimensions L x W x H 10.17 x 3.74 x 2.21 inches
Item Dimensions LxWxH 2.2 x 2.2 x 8 inches

Directions Zodiac Oatmeal Conditioning Shampoo for Dogs & Puppies may be used full strength or diluted with 2 parts water. Thoroughly wet the animal with warm water. Do not apply shampoo around eyes. The total amount of shampoo to be applied is 1 1/3 tablespoons for each 5 lbs of pet’s weight. Estimate the total amount of shampoo needed for your pet, then apply shampoo along the back of the animal. Work well into coat starting at the head and working back. Spread lather to include head, neck, legs and feet. Continue to work lather in over the whole animal [pet] for 3 to 5 minutes (this is an important part of the grooming procedure). After lather has been worked in over the entire animal, rinse animal thoroughly with warm water. For extremely dirty or scaly animals, the above procedure may be repeated. Repeat every 7 to 10 days, if necessary, for adult flea relief. Flea egg hatch inhibition will last for 28 days.
Warranty Description 100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back
Model Name Oatmeal Conditioning Shampoo for Dogs & Puppies
Age Range Description All Life Stages
Included Components Zodiac Oatmeal Conditioning Shampoo for Dogs & Puppies 18 ounces

Directions SHAKE WELL BEFORE EACH USE. Do not use on puppies under 12 weeks old. Wet dog's coat thoroughly. Starting at the head and working back, work up a rich lather thoroughly into the dog's coat down to the skin. Allow lather to stand for 5-7 minutes, then rinse completely and towel dry. name: ALZOO Natural Flea and Tick Repellent Shampoo for Dogs, Effectively Repels Fleas, Ticks & Mosquitos, Plant-Based Active Ingredients, Sulfate & Paraben-Free, 12 Fl. Oz.
short_description: IDEAL PLANT BASED REPELLENT REGIMEN - This unique formula contains 100% plant-based active ingredients such as cedarwood oil and peppermint oil and will help repel biting insects and other pests when used as directed. Use with ALZOO flea and tick sprays and collars.
EASY APPLICATION - Wet your dog, apply shampoo down the back (careful to avoid eyes and mucus membranes), lather, let sit for 2 minutes and rinse. Mild enough to use once a week.
CLEANS & PROTECTS: ALZOO Flea & Tick Shampoo is made with a soft formula that is suitable for dogs with sensitive skin. Cleans your dog and leave a very nice and shiny coat.
ALZOO PRODUCTS - Use nature's ingredients to be truly safe for dog, cats, the whole family, and the planet. Why put on their skin what you would NEVER use on your own.

POWERFUL & SUSTAINABLE - Our high-quality products are laboratory tested, safe for your pets & family when used as directed. Cruelty-free, and made in the USA using FSC Certified and recyclable packaging. ALZOO makes it easy to be both a good pet parent and a good citizen of the earth.

short_description: ADVANCED STRENGTH - 2X flea killing effectiveness. Kills fleas, flea larva, flea eggs, and ticks by contact and cleans and deodorizes your dog’s coat.
SAFE & EFFECTIVE - Each active essential oil is natural for a safe and effective solution you can trust.
SAFE TO USE FOR DOGS - Formulated for dogs 12 weeks or older when used as directed.
MADE IN THE USA - Our products are proudly manufactured in the USA with quality domestic and internationally sourced ingredients.
product_description: Natural Care+® Flea & Tick Shampoo was created to safely and effectively kill harmful fleas, flea larvae, flea eggs and ticks, when used as directed. Our unique blend of botanical oils is naturally sourced from variety of plants that, when combined, create a strong yet gentle defense for your dog.

Directions Directions: READ ENTIRE LABEL BEFORE EACH USE AND USE ONLY IN ACCORDANCE WITH LABEL INSTRUCTIONS. For Use Only on Dogs & Puppies Over 12 Weeks Old: Wet entire coat with warm water. Shake product well before use. Apply shampoo and lather. Avoid contact with eyes, mouth, nose and genitals. Massage thoroughly into dog’s coat. Be sure to treat hard-to-reach areas such as between toes. For best results, let stand or continue to massage for 5-10 minutes. Rinse thoroughly to remove dead fleas and ticks and dry dog with towel. Repeat if needed allowing 2-4 hours between applications, not exceeding twice in 24 hours. In order to help reduce the occurrence of fleas and ticks, this product is best used year round.
Model Name Natural Care Flea and Tick Shampoo for Dogs
Included Components 12oz Flea and Tick Shampoo

name: Earth Animal Apothecary Natural Flea & Tick - Herbal Shampoo for Dogs - 12 oz. Bottle
short_description: PROTECT & REPEL EFFECTIVELY AGAINST FLEAS, TICKS, & MOSQUITOES: A veterinary formulated shampoo infused with cedarwood & peppermint oils to produce a fresh, minty scent loathed by fleas, ticks, & mosquitoes.
ROOTED IN NATURE, BACKED BY SCIENCE: Our products work synergistically - internal products to bolster the body's immunity to insects and external products to help repel insects outside of the body.
DOUBLE DOWN FOR YOUR PET'S BEST PROTECTION: Pairs perfectly with our Daily Internal Powder, Daily Herbal Internal Powder, Daily Herbal Drops, and Skin Defense Chews.

THE MOST COMPREHENSIVE PROTECTION MOTHER NATURE CAN PROVIDE: Animals should never carry or consume harmful chemicals, especially when it comes to regular use of flea & tick protection. That's why we offer powerful, natural solutions for people and pets.
MADE WITH INTEGRITY: Earth Animal, a trusted B Corp, uses the Earth's finest ingredients and the best processes to make veterinarian formulated flea & tick solutions. Made in the USA.

name: Wahl USA Flea & Tick Repelling Dog Shampoo – Defense Formula with Rosemary & Cedar Scent – 24 Oz - 820007T
short_description: Made in the USA - Our rosemary & cedar scented pet shampoo is pH balanced, alcohol free, paraben free, PEG-80 free and is highly recommended for defending your pet’s coat
Defense Formula – This cedar & rosemary scented pet shampoo is great for protecting animal coats. The thick lather rinses off clean & keeps your pet looking and smelling clean

Less is More - Wahl has a higher concentrate of coconut derived sodding agent, which means you don’t have to use as much product as other dog shampoos. A little bit of shampoo goes a long way and provides a rich lather that’s easy to rinse off

Allergy Friendly - Our dog icon, Rocket, was designed in the image of our family dog, Cooper — a goldendoodle who has severe allergies. We've found this shampoo to be safe and effective for him. We love the smell too!

The Brand Used by Professionals - Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. clean, condition fur & hair for a smooth, soft coat. We are a company of animal lovers that want the best for your family member
product_description: Our shampoos are concentrated, which means a little bit goes a long way! Be sure to thoroughly rinse your dog after shampooing to leave no residual shampoo behind. In addition, it’s important to always comb out and dry your pets coat; leaving your dog with damp fur for hours can lead to protentional risk for dogs with sensitive skin. Wahl’s Defense Formula shampoo contains rosemary, cedar, & peppermint oils to help protect your puppy’s delicate skin and make them smell great! The rich lather helps clean dirty coats and other environmental residue. Since our shampoo easily cleans, it leaves your dog’s coat looking clean, silky, and smooth. Our plant derived ingredients make our shampoo the choice for owners who want to avoid harsh chemicals for their dog and themselves. Our shampoo is PEG-80 free, alcohol free, paraben free, and pH balanced. Our 24 oz size and concentrated formula allows for up to 70% more baths than other leading brands. While there are no harmful chemicals in our pet products, some pets are sensitive to certain plant oils used in our products. Wahl strongly recommends talking to your vet and doing a small spot test on your pet at least 24 hours before using any new product. Wahl has been serving professional vets and groomers for over 50 years. As a company of animal lovers, we believe your pet deserves the very best.
product_details: Special Ingredients Rosemary, Cedar, Peppermint Oils

product_description: Hartz UltraGuard Rid Flea & Tick Oatmeal Dog Shampoo provides your pup with relief from fleas and ticks. The cleansing formula kills fleas and ticks through contact. This shampoo is enriched with oatmeal to help provide soothing relief from itchy or irritated skin. Made for dogs or puppies 6 months of age and older. To use, wet pet's coat thoroughly with water and rub shampoo into coat, ensuring not to get suds into the eyes. Massage from head to tail until coat is completely covered with a foamy lather. Let stand or continue to massage for 5 minutes. Rinse and towel dry. Repeat weekly if necessary.
